comment.author: 69697638@N06
comment._content:
This image is now linked to a discussion of the Brown House, Lake Forest College, in connection with its local builder/renovator Van Wegenen Alling, who a Chicago Tribune article says was the builder too of the this Forestry pavilion, 1900 Paris Exposition.  

Arthur H. Miller, Archivist and Librarian for Special Collections, Lake Forest College (amiller@lakeforest.edu), 11-11-11
